question: How do I dispose of papers with ayats from the Quraan on them? These are mis-prints of some papers I was printing and also some books in very bad condition which are almost unreadable.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Papers with AYAATS of the Quran, Ahadith or the name of Allah should disposed of respectfully by burning them.

And Allah Ta'ala knows best

Mufti E. Desai
